snippet.title: Half-Life: Enriched - 0: Black Mesa Inbound Playthrough  (v0.50) - No commentary
snippet.description:
Half-Life: Enriched is a MOD that overhauls the original Half-Life campaign with improved levels, gameplay tweaks, 2x higher resolution textures, detail overlays, less loading points, improved lighting and much more!

This video was taken in version alpha 0.50. Everything you see in work in progress. 

Version 0.50 contain the first ten chapters of the Half-Life campaign! If you want to play it for yourself, head over to: https://www.moddb.com/mods/half-life-enriched

All custom content shown was created by Hezus.
